bugs.title: moodle package carries language packs which ae never used

bugzilla.short_desc: moodle package carries language packs which ae never used

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:

moodle-2.1.1-2.el6 carries huge amount of moodle langpacks which are never used.

moodle has changed language pack systemso that only en language pack is used from install dir. All other language packs are used from datadir and updated directly from net so bundled language packs should be removed from package.

moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 16.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16

moodle-2.1.5-2.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/moodle-2.1.5-2.el6

moodle-2.2.2-2.fc17 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 17.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/moodle-2.2.2-2.fc17

Package moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora 16 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=updates-testing moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2012-7597/moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16
then log in and leave karma (feedback).

moodle-2.1.5-3.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/moodle-2.1.5-3.el6
moodle-2.0.8-2.fc16 has been pushed to the Fedora 16 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
moodle-2.2.2-2.fc17 has been pushed to the Fedora 17 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

A number of flaws have been fixed in new upstream Moodle 2.2.2 [1], 2.1.5
[2], 2.0.8 [3], and 1.9.17 [4] releases.  These do not have CVEs assigned
(request pending), and since Fedora/EPEL will rebase to the latest versions
of each branch, I'm summarizing them all here rather than creating a number
of separate bugs.

[1] http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_2.2.2_release_notes
[2] http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_2.1.5_release_notes
[3] http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_2.0.8_release_notes
[4] http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_1.9.17_release_notes

MSA-12-0013: Database activity export permission issue (CVE-2012-1155)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x, 1.9.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-25185
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198621

MSA-12-0014: Password and Web services issue (CVE-2012-1168)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-30878
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198622

MSA-12-0015: Backup and private files issue (CVE-2012-1156)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-29248
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198623

MSA-12-0016: Default repository capabilities issue (CVE-2012-1157)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git;a=commit;h=246c2cb8e5af71a7d7c605b8fc9f9563e0fb3bc4
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198624

MSA-12-0017: Personal information leak issue (CVE-2012-1169)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x, 2.0.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-31463
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198625

MSA-12-0018: Course information leak in Gradebook export (CVE-2012-1158)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-29080
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198627

MSA-12-0019: Overview report and hidden course issue (CVE-2012-1159)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-29892
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198628

MSA-12-0020: Forum subscription permission issue (CVE-2012-1160)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-31426
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198629

MSA-12-0021: Course information leak through tags (CVE-2012-1161)
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-31466
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198630

MSA-12-0022: Security conflict in Web services
Affects: 2.2.x, 2.1.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-30495
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198631

MSA-12-0023: External enrolment plugin context check issue (CVE-2012-1170)
Affects: 2.2.x
Fix: http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-31178
Reference: http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=198632

Created moodle tracking bugs for this issue

Affects: fedora-all [bug 809226]
Affects: epel-all [bug 809227]

moodle-2.2.2-1.fc17 has been pushed to the Fedora 17 stable repository.

moodle-2.0.8-1.fc16 has been pushed to the Fedora 16 stable repository.

moodle-1.9.17-1.fc15 has been pushed to the Fedora 15 stable repository.

that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected Fedora
versions.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

When creating a Bodhi update request, please include this bug ID and the
bug IDs of this bug's parent bugs filed against the "Security Response"
product (the top-level CVE bugs).  Please mention the CVE IDs being fixed
in the RPM changelog when available.

Bodhi update submission link:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/new/?type_=security&bugs=809223

Please note: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora EPEL.
Only one tracking bug has been filed; please ensure that it is only closed
when all affected versions are fixed.


[bug automatically created by: add-tracking-bugs]

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by limb.
This update is currently being pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing updates repository.
This update has been pushed to testing
This update has been obsoleted by https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/moodle-2.1.5-3.el6

notes:
Drop bundled language packs.
New upstreams, multiple vulnerabilities.
